ability_id_at_interaction.description: Indicates the ability that the reward entity will play once the avatar interact with it.

audio_event_at_interaction.description: [wwise]Indicates the audio event that the reward entity will fire once the avatar interact with it.

animation_event_at_interaction.description: [string]Indicates the animation event that the reward entity will fire once the avatar interact with it.

ability_id_at_interaction_interactor.description: Indicates the ability that the avatar will play once interacts with the reward.

should_destroy_after_interaction.description: [bool]Indicates if we should destroy the entity after interaction.

default_exploration_reward_type.description: Indicates the reward type that we should give by default if we don't specify any script data in the marker.
